data.name: Mystique
data.description: A covert shapeshifter skilled at disabling stealthed targets and manipulating enemies into attacking each other.

starItems.name: Mystique
starItems.description: A covert shapeshifter skilled at disabling stealthed targets and manipulating enemies into attacking each other.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>105%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>105%</color> damage + copy <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and apply it to self.

If Magneto or Madelyne Pryor is an ally, copy <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage + copy <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and apply it to self.

If Magneto or Madelyne Pryor is an ally, copy <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary attack
Always Bonus Attack

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>145%</color> damage. Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage + copy <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and apply it to self.

If Magneto or Madelyne Pryor is an ally, copy <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>165%</color> damage. Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>145%</color> damage + copy <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and apply it to self.

If Magneto or Madelyne Pryor is an ally, copy <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary attack
Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> times

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>185%</color> damage. Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>145%</color> damage + copy <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and apply it to self.

If Magneto or Madelyne Pryor is an ally, copy <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>205%</color> damage. Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>165%</color> damage + copy <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and apply it to self.

If Magneto or Madelyne Pryor is an ally, copy <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Copy <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects
If Magneto or Madelyne Pryor is an ally, copy all positive effects

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>245%</color> damage + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>205%</color> damage + copy <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, and apply it to self.

If Magneto or Madelyne Pryor is an ally, copy all positive effects, except <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, when this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, apply <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>105%</color> damage. Attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target that does not have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>95%</color> damage.

Attack <color=#86e619>3</color> additional targets that do have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>95%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> from each target.

If no enemies had <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
This ability does not remove <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> from the primary target.
If Magneto or Madelyne Pryor are an ally, this attack is Unavoidable.
If Mister Sinister is an ally, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on each target.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage. Attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target that does not have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>115%</color> damage.

Attack <color=#86e619>3</color> additional targets that do have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>115%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> from each target.

If no enemies had <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
This ability does not remove <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> from the primary target.
If Magneto or Madelyne Pryor are an ally, this attack is Unavoidable.
If Mister Sinister is an ally, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on each target.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Attack all additional targets that do have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>155%</color> damage. Attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target that does not have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>115%</color> damage.

Attack all additional targets that do have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>115%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> from each target.

If no enemies had <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
This ability does not remove <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> from the primary target.
If Magneto or Madelyne Pryor are an ally, this attack is Unavoidable.
If Magneto or Madelyne Pryor are an ally, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on each target.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
If Mister Sinister is an ally, always flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on each target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>175%</color> damage. Attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional target that does not have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>135%</color> damage.

Attack all additional targets that do have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>135%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> from each target.

If no enemies had <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
This ability does not remove <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> from the primary target.
If Magneto or Madelyne Pryor are an ally, this attack is Unavoidable.
If Mister Sinister is an ally, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on each target.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets that do not have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>205%</color> damage. Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets that do not have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>135%</color> damage.

Attack all additional targets that do have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>135%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> from each target.

If Mister Sinister is an ally, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on each target.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>225%</color> damage. Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> additional targets that do not have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>155%</color> damage.

Attack all additional targets that do have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>155%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> from each target.

If no enemies had <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

6.nextUpgrade:

Attack <color=#86e619>3</color> additional targets that do not have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>
If Mister Sinister is an ally, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>255%</color> damage. Attack <color=#86e619>3</color> additional targets that do not have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>185%</color> damage.

Attack all additional targets that do have <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>185%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> from each target.

If no enemies had <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
This ability does not remove <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> from the primary target.
If Magneto or Madelyne Pryor are an ally, this attack is Unavoidable.
If Mister Sinister is an ally, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on each target.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>85%</color> damage.

Trick <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy to attack the primary target. The tricked enemy gains +<color=#86e619>80%</color> Damage for this attack.

<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack is Unavoidable.
> This attack targets a non-summoned enemy with lowest Speed instead of the primary target, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage for tricked enemy

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>105%</color> damage.

Trick <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy to attack the primary target. The tricked enemy gains +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Damage for this attack.

<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack is Unavoidable.
> This attack targets a non-summoned enemy with lowest Speed instead of the primary target, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage for tricked enemy
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the lowest Speed, non-summoned enemy

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>105%</color> damage.

Trick <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy to attack the primary target. The tricked enemy gains +<color=#86e619>120%</color> Damage for this attack.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack is Unavoidable.
> This attack targets a non-summoned enemy with lowest Speed instead of the primary target, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the primary target for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage for tricked enemy

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage.

Trick <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy to attack the primary target. The tricked enemy gains +<color=#86e619>140%</color> Damage for this attack.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack is Unavoidable.
> This attack targets a non-summoned enemy with lowest Speed instead of the primary target, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the primary target.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage for tricked enemy

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>145%</color> damage.

Trick <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy to attack the primary target. The tricked enemy gains +<color=#86e619>160%</color> Damage for this attack.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack is Unavoidable.
> This attack targets a non-summoned enemy with lowest Speed instead of the primary target, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the primary target.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage for tricked enemy
Always gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to that target

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>145%</color> damage.

Trick <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy to attack the primary target. The tricked enemy gains +<color=#86e619>180%</color> Damage for this attack.

<color=#86e619>100%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
> This attack is Unavoidable.
> This attack targets a non-summoned enemy with lowest Speed instead of the primary target, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the primary target.
> If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to that target
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage for tricked enemy

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>165%</color> damage.

Trick <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy to attack the primary target. The tricked enemy gains +<color=#86e619>200%</color> Damage for this attack.

Always gain  <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
>This attack is Unavoidable.
> This attack targets a non-summoned enemy with lowest Speed instead of the primary target, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
> Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the primary target.
> If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>MARAUDER</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to that target

1.description:
On Spawn, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

On a non-Cloned Magneto's or Mister Sinister's turn, prolong all positive effects on self and Magneto by a duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Mister Sinister is an ally, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities

2.description:
On Spawn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

On a non-Cloned Magneto's or Mister Sinister's turn, prolong all positive effects on self and Magneto by a duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Mister Sinister is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities.
2.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Resistance against <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities

3.description:
On Spawn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>. Gain <color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Resistance against <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

On a non-Cloned Magneto's or Mister Sinister's turn, prolong all positive effects on self and Magneto by a duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Mister Sinister is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities.
3.nextUpgrade: On a non-Cloned Magneto's or Mister Sinister's turn, prolong all positive effects on Mystique and Magneto by a duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

4.description:
On Spawn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>. Gain <color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Resistance against <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

On a non-Cloned Magneto's or Mister Sinister's turn, prolong all positive effects on self and Magneto by a duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Mister Sinister is an ally, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to assist on non-attack abilities.
4.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, always gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>
Always assist on non-attack abilities

5.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>. Gain <color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Resistance against <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

On a non-Cloned Magneto's or Mister Sinister's turn, prolong all positive effects on self and Magneto by a duration of <color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Mister Sinister is an ally, assist on non-attack abilities.
